toolsSummary: A full spectrum designer using Sketch, Figma and custom apps. I create my prototypes in HTML + CSS, JavaScript, WebVR and InVision. All my code is hosted on Amazon web services (AWS), GitHub or any Raspberry Pi running Linux.
